reviews.review_text:
The food here is absolutely delicious! Every dish we tried was bursting with flavor and cooked to perfection. Highly recommend their Stuffed Crabs and Tandoori prawns

The View from the restaurant is one of the best views that you are gonna get when you are in Goa.

The staff here truly cares about their guests. They were attentive, courteous, and polite.

Visited this place for dinner, and it was an absolutely delightful experience.
Food was delicious and flavourful but could be improved.
Drinks were reasonably priced.
The service was quick and efficient. The waiters ensured our comfort and needs were met, but in rush hours, you can find it difficult to contact them.

The ambience is the best thing in this restaurant. Live music adds cherry on the top along with the serene beauty and sound of the ocean.

The restaurant offers a stunning view of the ocean, making it an ideal spot for watching the breathtaking sunset.

Overall a fantastic place to spend your evening. Definitely worth visiting again. It's highly recommended for a memorable dining experience.

I visited Sea Pebbles around 10 PM for dinner, and it was an absolutely delightful experience.

Food:
We tried a few of the non-vegetarian chicken starters, and they were delicious. Every bite was packed with flavor and perfectly cooked.

Drinks:
Though we only had lime soda and lime water, both were refreshing and spot on.

Service:
The service was quick and efficient, and they ensured our comfort and needs were met.

Ambience:
The ambience was a perfect getaway! The highlight of the night was the live one-man band music, which was simply amazing. The music was so captivating that I couldn’t resist dancing with my companion. Many other guests joined in, dancing and enjoying the vibe. There was even a brief karaoke session that night.

The restaurant also offers a stunning view of the ocean, making it an ideal spot for catching a breathtaking sunset.

Overall:
I absolutely loved this place! From the food to the atmosphere, everything was fantastic. It’s definitely worth visiting again. Highly recommended for a memorable dining experience.

PS: better to reserve a table at the restaurant in advance.
